publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-04 21:47:56 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.abstract: This collection includes one poster and one pamphlet from the Tufts University Department of Computer Science.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series: Publications.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one poster and one pamphlet from the Department of Computer Science. The materials advertise the Department's graduate program.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Steven Gentry, Archives and Reference Assistant, processed this collection at the folder-level in December, 2017 under the direction of Adrienne Pruitt, Collections Management Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Computer Science Records, 1990-2000. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

controlaccess.subject: Curriculum and Instruction -- Academic Departments and Programs

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research.
